content.text: 3 medium potatoes, cut into 1/2 inch cubes
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "3 medium potatoes, cut into 1/2 inch cubes" )

content.text: 2 pounds fully cooked kielbasa or Polish sausage, cut into serving size pieces
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "2 pounds fully cooked kielbasa or Polish sausage, cut into serving size pieces" )

content.text: 0) In a 5-qt. slow cooker, combine the cabbage, potatoes, onion, salt and pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@27:34 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the cabbage"@35:46 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "potatoes"@48:56 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "onion"@58:63 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "salt"@65:69 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "pepper"@74:80 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a 5-qt. slow cooker"@6:25 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Place sausage on top (slow cooker will be full, but cabbage will cook down).
3) Cover and cook on low for 8-9 hours or until vegetables are tender and sausage is heated through.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Cover and cook"@3:17 / AC
		:heat ( temp-3-0 "low"@21:24 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-3-0 "8-9 hours"@29:38 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-3-0 "until vegetables are tender and sausage is heated through"@42:99 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
